Details

Connectivity

connection

Microphone

Features

Lightweight construction for hours of comfort 
Plush leatherette adjustable memory foam ear pads
Dolby ® Audio 7.1 surround sound on PC and Mac
High-quality custom-tuned 50mm neodymium audio drivers
Omni-directional microphone with flip-to-mute function
Easy-access on-ear volume and mute controls
